verses.roman:
yaiche āmāra 'svarūpa', yaiche āmāra 'sthiti'
yaiche āmāra guṇa, karma, ṣaḍ-aiśvarya-śakti

synonyms: yaiche—as far as; āmāra—My; svarūpa—original form; yaiche—as far as; āmāra—My; sthiti—situation; yaiche—as far as; āmāra—My; guṇa—attributes; karma—activities; ṣaṭ-aiśvarya-śakti—six kinds of opulence.
translation: " 'I shall explain to you My actual form and situation, My attributes, activities and six opulences.'
